channel.title: 718 setrights command
channel.description: okay so i need help i used the setrights command on one of my players and now i cant remove their rights is there a special file or is it stored in the player file itself?

item.title: 718 setrights command
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

I have not used any 718 bases before, but I’m pretty sure it’s in the character file. Can’t you always just do ::setrights player 0 to reset it? Post a character file and I’ll be happy to look over it for you.

Read full topic
